name: TORO (itch) (Thomas Worrell)
description:
Run! Slide! Wall run! Slow time!? Use any means necessary to escape the stampeding bull! Coffee shop? Looks like a good route to get away!

Note this is not the final product however, marks the end of our 3-week development period. Leaving 3 weeks for polish and development.

Experience the gripping action and intense parkour of Toro spanning over 4 levels with unique mechanics and varied obstacles that will keep you wanting more! Try to stay alive and running in this action packed escape game! 

Longer gameplay video:
